Package view

Class OpenedChatFrame

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
view.OpenedChatFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class OpenedChatFrame extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
This class is the controller of the opened chat frame. It is the frame that contains the chat with the selected user. It is displayed when the user clicks on a user in the list of online users and when the chat session is open.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the opened chat frame It is called when the OpenedChatFrame is opened It set the history of the chat It set the label of the pseudo of the chatter It set the label of the display status

    • setHistory

      public void setHistory()
      Set the history of the chat It is called when the OpenedChatFrame is opened It get the history of the chat in the database

    • setParentController

      public void setParentController​(MainFrame parentController)
      It set the parent controller of the opened chat frame It is called in the main frame
      Parameters:
      parentController - , The parent controller of the opened chat frame

    • getSession

      public TCPSession getSession()
      It gets the TCP session with the chatter
      Returns:
      The TCP session with the chatter

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat()
      It updates the chat displayed It is called when the user clicks on the button "Search" It is called when the user clicks on the button "Cross"

    • addMessageToChat

      public void addMessageToChat​(Message message, Boolean sender)
      It adds a message to the chat It is called when the user clicks on the button "Send" It is called when the user receive a message It changes the design of the message displayed depending on the sender It adapts the position of the position depending on his size
      Parameters:
      message - , The message to add to the chat
      sender - , True if the message is sent by the user, false otherwise

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage()
      It sends a message to the chatter It is called when the user clicks on the button "Send" It is called when the user presses the key "Enter"

    • deleteConvo

      public void deleteConvo()
      It deletes the history of the chat in the database and in the chat displayed. It is called when the user clicks on the button "Delete history". It deletes the history if the user confirms his choice in a pop-up.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage​(Message message)
      It is called when the user receive a message It calls the method addMessageToChat to add the message to the chat It precise that the message is not sent by the user
      Parameters:
      message - , The message received

    • hideChatPane

      public void hideChatPane()
      It calls the method of the mainFrame to hide the chatPane It is called when the user click on the hide button or when the chat session is closed

    • closeChatSession

      public void closeChatSession()
      It calls the method of the mainFrame to close the chat session It is called when the user clicks on the button "Close"

    • searchMessage

      public void searchMessage()
      It search a message in the chat displayed It is called when the user clicks on the button "Search"

    • cancelSearch

      public void cancelSearch()
      It cancels the research of a message in the chat displayed It is called when the user clicks on the cross button
